# ERGONOMIC SERVICES TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT

## **Issuance Date**
2023-12-18

## **Tender Closing Date and Time**
2024-02-01T14:00:00

## **Contract Duration**
The successful bidder will be awarded a contract for a period of 12 months renewable for two option periods, each of one (1) year.

## **Description of Services**
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) requires the services of an external expert in workplace ergonomic services to support the implementation of its Treasury Board Policy on the Duty to Accommodate Persons with Disabilities in the Federal Public Service and its own Workplace Accommodation Guidelines.

## **Scope of Work**
- Conduct workplace ergonomic assessments to identify areas of improvement and provide recommendations to mitigate risks and enhance employee safety and well-being.
- Collaborate with AAFC's Integrated Disability Management team and other stakeholders to develop and implement ergonomic solutions that meet the physical needs of employees.
- Provide training and support to AAFC employees on workplace ergonomics and accessibility.

## **Security Requirements**
The selected bidder will be required to meet the applicable security requirements of AAFC, which includes a security screening and obtaining a reliability status as determined by the Treasury Board Secretariat.

## **Boundary Map**
The successful bidder will be required to work in various locations across Canada.

## **Proposed Award and Options**
AAFC intends to award one (1) contract to the successful bidder for the term of the contract.

## **Evaluation Criteria**
The evaluation criteria for this tender will be based on a combined score of the bidder's technical merit and price.

## **Notice of this Tender**
This notice is being issued in accordance with the Trade Agreement and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
